The pod left the stasis lock and the Adn process begun.

  ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: S=
aturday, October 14, 2000 1:21 AM
  Subject: Re: Enemy Fire


  ::DevilDuer=
::

  DevilDuer stares at the pod. He was getting a bit ticked that it was =
just 
  sitting there, not doing anything. Suddenly, a thought occurs to De=
vilDuer. 
  WHat if the bot was programmed a Maximal! It would open fire on=
 him!

  He bolts over to the pod, tapping the small screen. He knew it! It=
 was 
  Maximal...

  He reaches into a compartment, taking out a reprogram=
ming chip. He placed it 
  on the screen of the pod, and began the reprogra=
mming procedure. He didn't 
  know too much about this, but he figured he c=
ould get by well enough to turn 
  the bot into a loyal Alliance member.

 =
       eGroups Sponsor
